Title: Image support in Prompts
introduction: We've added image upload support to prompts. When using an image-capable LLM, you can now include images in your prompts, expanding the variety of use cases and possibilities.

New.description: Added support for custom slugs in Prompt IDs to improve code readability
Introduced prompt caching for Anthropic model API requests
Added `override_config` parameter to modify or append default prompt configurations
Added Prompt Name column to logs for better request tracking
Launched public AI Models library showcasing LLM capabilities and pricing

Improved.description: Enhanced credential management interface for better usability
Streamlined the experience of using existing prompts in Playground

Fixed.description: Resolved prompt execution error on Prompts page
Resolved UI glitches during long text generation
